entry.title: Python/Zope/Plone internship
entry.summary: Python with Zope/Plone internship (6 months) at GymGlish in Paris.
entry.content:
Gymglish is developing a new approach to language learning and is looking for a technical intern with Python and notable Zope/Plone experience.

**Job Description**:

* Development of core functionality for front- and backoffice tools in Zope/Plone
* General Python development (all our software is written in Python)
* Unit testing

Join our 4 man engineering team of talented Python developers and have some fun with us!

**Required**:

* Strong Python skills
* Experience with Zope/Plone
* Good python programming skills
* Good English is a requirement

We are not currently considering telecommuting as an option.

The position is an internship for 6 months at our Paris offices.
entry.address: GymGlish 16A, bd de Reuilly 75012 Paris France
